flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
３つあるのは　頭だけでは　ないらしい。
心臓と　肺も　３つなので　息切れしないで
長い　距離を　走る　ことが　できるのだ。

Apparently, the heads aren’t the only parts of the body that
Dodrio has three of. It has three sets of hearts and lungs as
well, so it is capable of running long distances without rest.

Pare che Dodrio non abbia soltanto tre teste, ma anche altri
organi triplici: ha infatti anche tre cuori e sei polmoni che
gli consentono di percorrere grandi distanze senza sosta.

Según parece, las cabezas no son las únicas partes del
cuerpo que tiene triplicadas. Dodrio también tiene tres
corazones y tres pares de pulmones. Con esta constitución,
puede correr largas distancias sin cansarse.

Dodri hat nicht nur drei Köpfe, auch andere Körperteile sind
dreifach vorhanden. Es besitzt drei Herzen und drei Lungen,
sodass es lange Strecken ohne Pause rennen kann.

Apparemment, Dodrio ne se contente pas d’avoir trois têtes.
Il semble également avoir trois cœurs et six poumons,
ce qui lui permet de courir très longtemps sans s’épuiser.

3개 있는 것은 머리뿐이 아닌 것 같다.
심장과 폐도 3개라서 숨이 가빠지지
않으며 먼 거리를 달릴 수 있다.

３つあるのは　あたまだけでは　ないらしい。
しんぞうと　はいも　３つなので　いきぎれしないで
ながい　きょりを　はしる　ことが　できるのだ。

３つの　頭が　別々の　方向を
向いている　ときは　警戒している　証拠。
うかつに　近寄ると　くちばしで　突かれるぞ。

Watch out if Dodrio’s three heads are looking in three separate
directions. It’s a sure sign that it is on its guard. Don’t go near
this Pokémon if it’s being wary—it may decide to peck you.

Se le tre teste di Dodrio guardano in tre direzioni diverse,
significa che il Pokémon è vigile. In questo stato il Pokémon
non va avvicinato, poiché potrebbe decidere di attaccare.

Según parece, las cabezas no son las únicas partes del
cuerpo que tiene triplicadas. Dodrio también tiene tres
corazones y tres pares de pulmones. Con esta constitución,
puede correr largas distancias sin cansarse.

Dodris drei Köpfe blicken in drei verschiedene Richtungen.
Es ist immer auf der Hut. Du solltest dich diesem Pokémon
nicht nähern, wenn es bereits misstrauisch ist. Es könnte
nach dir hacken.

Il faut se méfier lorsque les trois têtes de Dodrio regardent
dans des directions différentes. Cela signifie qu’il est sur ses
gardes. Si c’est le cas, il vaut mieux ne pas s’approcher de ce
Pokémon, il pourrait décider d’attaquer.

3개의 머리가 서로 다른 방향을
향하고 있을 때는 경계 중인 증거다.
섣불리 가까이 가면 부리에 쪼인다.

３つの　あたまが　べつべつの　ほうこうを
むいている　ときは　けいかいしている　しょうこ。
うかつに　ちかよると　くちばしで　つつかれるぞ。

めったに　見つからない　珍種。
３つの　頭は　喜び　悲しみ
怒りの　感情を　表す。

An odd species that is rarely found. The three
heads respectively represent joy, sadness,
and anger.

Pokémon raro e bizzarro. Le sue tre teste
rappresentano rispettivamente la gioia, la tristezza
e la rabbia.

Es una especie muy rara y difícil de encontrar.
Las tres cabezas simbolizan la alegría, la tristeza
y la ira.

Ein seltsames Exemplar, das nur selten gefunden wird.
Die drei Köpfe repräsentieren Freude, Trauer und Wut.

Une espèce étrange que l’on trouve rarement.
Les trois têtes représentent la joie, la tristesse et
la colère.

좀처럼 발견하기 힘든 진귀한 종이다.
3개의 머리는 기쁨, 슬픔, 분노의
감정을 나타낸다.

めったに　みつからない　ちんしゅ。
３つの　あたまは　よろこび　かなしみ
いかりの　かんじょうを　あらわす。

３つの　頭が　見ている前で
わずかでも　すきを　見せると
クチバシで　激しく　つつかれる。

An enemy that takes its eyes off any of the
three heads--even for a second--will get
pecked severely.

Occorre fare attenzione a tutte le sue tre teste,
altrimenti si rischia d’essere colpiti duramente.

Más vale no perder de vista ninguna de las tres
cabezas. De lo contrario, el número de picotazos
será enorme.

Lässt ein Feind auch nur einen der drei Köpfe
für nur eine Sekunde aus den Augen, wird er
sofort gepickt.

Un ennemi ne faisant pas attention à l’une des trois
têtes pendant une seconde se fait picorer.

3개의 머리가 보고 있는 앞에서
조금이라도 빈틈을 보이면
부리로 격렬하게 쪼아댄다.

３つの　あたまが　みているまえで
わずかでも　すきを　みせると
くちばしで　はげしく　つつかれる。

When Doduo evolves into this odd
breed, one of its heads splits into
two. It runs at nearly 40 mph.

When Doduo evolves into this odd
breed, one of its heads splits into
two. It runs at nearly 40 mph.

When Doduo evolves into this odd
breed, one of its heads splits into
two. It runs at nearly 40 mph.

Quand Doduo connaît cette étrange
évolution, l’une de ses têtes se
dédouble. Il atteint les 60 km/h.

When Doduo evolves into this odd
breed, one of its heads splits into
two. It runs at nearly 40 mph.

Quand Doduo connaît cette étrange
évolution, l’une de ses têtes se
dédouble. Il atteint les 60 km/h.

If one of the heads gets to eat,
the others will be satisfied, too,
and they will stop squabbling.

It collects data and plans three times
as wisely, but it may think too much
and fall into a state of immobility.

When DODUO evolves into this odd
breed, one of its heads splits into
two. It runs at nearly 40 mph.

When DODUO evolves into this odd
breed, one of its heads splits into
two. It runs at nearly 40 mph.

When DODUO evolves into this odd
breed, one of its heads splits into
two. It runs at nearly 40 mph.

Uses its three brains to execute complex
plans. While two heads sleep, one head is
said to stay awake.

An odd species that is rarely found.
The three heads respectively represent
joy, sadness, and anger.

A peculiar POKéMON species with three
heads. It vigorously races across grassy
plains even in arid seasons with little
rainfall.

Apparently, the heads aren’t the only
parts of the body that DODRIO has
three of. It has three sets of hearts and lungs
as well, so it is capable of running long
distances without rest.

Watch out if DODRIO’s three heads are
looking in three separate directions.
It’s a sure sign that it is on its guard. Don’t go near this POKéMON if it’s being
wary - it may decide to peck you.

An enemy that
takes its eyes off
any of the three heads--even for a
second--will get
pecked severely.

If one of the
heads gets to eat,
the others will be satisfied, too,
and they will stop
squabbling.

It collects data 
and plans three
times as wisely, but it may think
too much and be­
come immobilized.

One of DODUO's 2
heads splits to
form a unique species. It runs
close to 40 MPH
in prairies.

Uses its three
brains to execute
complex plans. While two heads
sleep, one head
stays awake.

Uses its three
brains to execute
complex plans. While two heads
sleep, one head
stays awake.
